authority.description: Authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

recipient.description: Recipient address of the account receiving funds.

percentage.description: Percentage is the percentage of funds to be allocated from Community pool.

expiry.description: Optional, if expiry is set, removes the state object when expired.

MsgCreateContinuousFund.title: Msg Create Continuous Fund
MsgCreateContinuousFund.description: MsgCreateContinuousFund defines a message for adding continuous funds.
